zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前比特币/美元(BTC/USD)的价格为90543.98，日内变化幅度较小，仅为-0.14%。在高点90721.76和低点90414.95之间的波动表明，市场正处于整理阶段。短期内，价格未能突破91000的心理关口，显示出卖压的增加。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI(14)尚不可用，但MACD指标为-43.78430，表明当前市场情绪偏向于空头。即使在SMA(20)的水平91008.46850附近，价格依旧未能有效反弹，显示出市场缺乏强劲的买盘支撑。这可能意味着短期内价格仍面临下行风险。

在支撑和阻力方面，当前支撑位在90400附近，而阻力位则在91000一线。若价格突破91000，可能重新引发买盘兴趣；反之，若跌破90400，可能加速下行，测试更低的支撑水平。

交易建议方面，考虑到当前市场的震荡整理趋势，建议交易者保持谨慎，观望为主。若价格突破91000，可考虑短期做多；若跌破90400，则建议考虑做空，以应对潜在的风险。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Bitcoin is currently trading at $90,543.98, reflecting a slight decline of 0.14% over the past 24 hours. The price action has remained relatively stable within a narrow range, having tested a high of $90,721.76 and a low of $90,414.95. This consolidation phase suggests indecision among traders, indicating that a breakout may occur soon. Monitoring price movements closely will be essential to identify potential trends as they develop.

In terms of technical indicators, the MACD is currently at -43.78430, signaling bearish momentum. However, without the signal line available, it is difficult to gauge the strength of this indicator. The absence of a Relative Strength Index (RSI) complicates the analysis further; typically, an RSI above 70 indicates overbought conditions, while below 30 suggests oversold status. Traders should be cautious and consider waiting for clearer signals before initiating new positions.

Support and resistance levels appear to be forming around the observed price range. The recent high of $90,721.76 could serve as a resistance level, while the low of $90,414.95 may act as immediate support. A sustained move above $90,721.76 might signal a bullish breakout, while a drop below $90,414.95 could trigger bearish sentiment and further selling pressure. 

For traders, the current environment suggests a wait-and-see approach might be prudent. If the price breaks above the resistance level, it could provide a buying opportunity. Conversely, if it falls below support, a short position could be considered. Participants should remain vigilant and utilize stop-loss orders to manage risk effectively in this volatile market.
